analysis.description:
ProofOfLongHodl.claim (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#149-156) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_dividends) (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#153-154)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.20', '^0.4.21']
	- /unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.20
	- /unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#7-9 declares pragma solidity^0.4.21

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#201-202:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#1): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#7-9): it allows old versions
Parameter '_user' of ProofOfLongHodl.preauthorize (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#40) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ProofOfLongHodl.depositHelper (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#50-51) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ProofOfLongHodl.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_user' of ProofOfLongHodl.dividendsForUser (/unique_chucks/9/0x425e9ec3181d9ddfbfc417f1b9b55dbbd78c3a05.sol#163) is not in mixedCase
